column4: So, im trying to get my ubtunu 9.04 to recognize my motorola l7 slvr, its on memory card mode (other option is data/fax ), question is how do i mount it (not doing it auto)
run a dmesg and see if the kernel picks up on it at all.

it's the last line "scsi 7:0:0:0: Device offlined - not ready after error recovery" that seems to be an issue.  i've never tried attaching a phone to linux before so i'm useless too you.  but it's not seeing it as a drive yet.  good luck man.
thanks for looking man, im going to try and reboot and see if it changes
./installer.sh will run whatever that script is
